messages.title: Alan Campbell - the experienced, local choice
messages.content: In these uncertain times it is more important than ever that our community is represented by an experienced, local MP with a proven track record. After nearly a decade in Government the Tories have been forced to admit that crime is going up and NHS waiting times are growing longer. School funding is being cut and Brexit is a mess. Too often local people have insecure jobs on low pay and struggle to make ends meet. The gap between the North East and London is getting wider. And all this is during the time the Tories have been in charge.

messages.title: The real choice in this election
messages.content: The real choice in this election is between an experienced, local candidate with a proven track record or another Tory sent to follow the party line. I ask you to place your trust in me again on Thursday 12 December.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: We can invest in our schools and give our children a better future. We can reduce pensioner poverty and make work pay. How do we know? Because Labour has done it before.

mentions.tacticalSituation: The gap between the North East and London is getting wider. And all this is during the time the Tories have been in charge.

issues.government: After nearly a decade in Government the Tories have been forced to admit that crime is going up and NHS waiting times are growing longer.
issues.health: NHS waiting times are growing longer.
issues.labourEmployment: Too often local people have insecure jobs on low pay and struggle to make ends meet.
issues.socialWelfare: We can reduce pensioner poverty and make work pay.

community.content: I’ve worked with businesses and residents in Whitley Bay and Monkseaton to regenerate our seaside town. With Cullercoats residents to save our Urgent Care Centre. With pensioners in New York who were missing out on Pension Credit. With domestic abuse victims in North Shields seeking a safe place to live. With residents in Tynemouth to tackle alcohol related anti-social behaviour. With householders in Shiremoor to protect their homes from flooding.

contactInformation.address: 99 Howard Street, North Shields, Tyne and Wear NE30 1NA

personalStories.story: I’ve worked with businesses and residents in Whitley Bay and Monkseaton to regenerate our seaside town. With Cullercoats residents to save our Urgent Care Centre. With pensioners in New York who were missing out on Pension Credit. With domestic abuse victims in North Shields seeking a safe place to live. With residents in Tynemouth to tackle alcohol related anti-social behaviour. With householders in Shiremoor to protect their homes from flooding.

nonPolicyAttributes.localness: It’s important to have an experienced, local MP, someone who lives in and understands our local community.
